resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105038</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105038</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204437</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Soil and erosion unit: Section 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Boden und Abnutzungmaßeinheit: Kapitel 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sol et unité d'érosion : Section 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Solo e unidade da erosão: Seção 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terreno ed unità di erosione: Parte 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χώμα και μονάδα διάβρωσης: Παράγραφος 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Suelo y unidad de la erosión: Sección 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This unit will involve descriptive information on North Carolina soil types and how the presence of plants affects soil erosion. This section should be begun only after completion of Soil and erosion unit: Section 1.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit bezieht beschreibende 
Informationen über Nord-Carolina Bodentypen mit ein und wie das 
Vorhandensein der Betriebe Bodenabnutzung beeinflußt. Dieses 
Kapitel sollte nur nach Vollendung des Bodens und der 
Abnutzungmaßeinheit angefangen werden: Kapitel 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité impliquera l'information descriptive 
sur les types du nord de sol de la Caroline et comment la 
présence des usines affecte l'érosion de sol. Cette section 
devrait être commencée seulement après l'accomplissement du sol et 
de l'unité d'érosion : Section 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade envolverá a informação descritiva 
em tipos do solo de North.carolina e como a presença das plantas 
afeta a erosão do solo. Esta seção deve ser começada somente
após a conclusão do solo e da unidade da erosão: Seção 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità coinvolgerà le informazioni 
descrittive sui tipi del terreno del North.carolina e come la presenza
delle piante interessa l'erosione del terreno. Questa sezione 
dovrebbe essere cominciata solo dopo completamento di terreno e 
dell'unità di erosione: Parte 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα θα περιλάβει τις περιγραφικές 
πληροφορίες για τους εδαφολογικούς τύπους της βόρειας Καρολίνας 
και πώς η παρουσία εγκαταστάσεων έχει επιπτώσεις στην 
εδαφολογική διάβρωση. Αυτό το τμήμα πρέπει να αρχίσουν 
μόνο μετά από την ολοκλήρωση του χώματος και της μονάδας 
διάβρωσης: Παράγραφος 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad implicará la información descriptiva
sobre tipos del suelo de Carolina del Norte y cómo la presencia de 
plantas afecta la erosión del suelo. Esta sección se debe 
comenzar solamente después de la terminación del suelo y de la 
unidad de la erosión: Sección 1.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105038</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/soil-and-erosion-unit-section-2</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
